titleStmt.title: A treatise of the Pope's supremacy to which is added A discourse concerning the unity of the church / by Isaac Barrow ...
titleStmt.author: Barrow, Isaac, 1630-1677.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected, with a table to the whole.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher and J. Heptinstall, for Brabazon Aylmer ...,

notesStmt.note: A discourse concerning the unity of the church has special t.p.
This work may also be found bound with Barrow's Works, v.1, at reel 164:8.
Reproduction of original in Eton College, Eton, England.
